titleStmt.title: A paper sent forth into the world from them that are scornfully called Quakers declaring the grounds and reasons why they deny the teachers of the world (who profess themselves to be ministers) and dissent from them.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

titleStmt.title: A paper sent forth into the world from them that are scornfully called Quakers declaring the grounds and reasons why they deny the teachers of the world (who profess themselves to be ministers) and dissent from them.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Fox by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
